strings.TITLE_SCREEN_RESET_CONFIRM: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO RESTART? ALL PREVIOUS DATA WILL BE LOST.
strings.MAIN_SCREEN: BARBIE, TERESA AND RENEE NEED YOUR HELP RECOVERING STOLEN GEMS! TRAIN TO JOIN THE SPY SQUAD AND HELP BARBIE AND HER FRIENDS SAVE THE DAY!
strings.GAMEPLAY_SCREEN_QUIT_CONFIRM_TEXT: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO QUIT?
strings.GAME_COMPLETE_3_CHARACTERS_TEXT: YOU COMPLETED ALL 3 MISSIONS AND RECOVERED THE STOLEN GEMS. GREAT JOB! COMPLETE TRAINING WITH EACH CHARACTER TO EARN A SPECIAL ACHIEVEMENT.
strings.GAME_COMPLETE_3_CHARACTERS_ALL_MISSIONS_: YOU'VE COMPLETED YOUR TRAINING WITH ALL THREE CHARACTERS!
strings.MOTORCYCLE_TUTORIAL_DISTANCE_DESCRIPTION: Get to the end of the road without running out of health to complete the mission!
strings.MOTORCYCLE_TUTORIAL_DRIVING_DESCRIPTION: Use the arrow keys to move between lanes.
strings.MOTORCYCLE_TUTORIAL_DRIVING_DESCRIPTION_: Use the up and down buttons to navigate the training streets.
strings.MOTORCYCLE_TUTORIAL_ENEMIES_DESCRIPTION: Watch out for enemy robots and oil slicks! If you hit them, your health meter will go down.
strings.MOTORCYCLE_TUTORIAL_HEALTH_DESCRIPTION: Move between the three lanes, collecting gems to keep your health meter up.
strings.MOTORCYCLE_TUTORIAL_JUMP_DESCRIPTION: Press the spacebar to jump over obstacles.
strings.MOTORCYCLE_TUTORIAL_JUMP_DESCRIPTION_MOB: Use the jump button to jump over obstacles.
strings.SECRET_AGENT_TUTORIAL_LASER_TRAPS_DESCRI: Avoid the laser traps and patrolling robots! If you run into a laser trap or touch a robot, you'll lose a heart.
strings.SECRET_AGENT_TUTORIAL_MOVEMENT_DESCRIPTI: Move through the room using the arrow keys and climb button to reach the stolen gem.
Move through the room using the arrow keys and climb button to reach the stolen gem.
strings.SECRET_AGENT_TUTORIAL_HINT_DESCRIPTION: The lasers will turn on and off. When a laser turns off, move fast to get past it!
strings.CODE_CRACKING_TUTORIAL_MISSION_DESCRIPTI: Connect the tiles to make a path from the green start space, to the blue finish space.
strings.CODE_CRACKING_TUTORIAL_TILES_DESCRIPTION: Click on a purple tile to change its position. Once a tile is correct it will lock.
strings.CODE_CRACKING_TUTORIAL_LIVES_DESCRIPTION: Be quick! If your puppy moves to a space that isn't connected, you'll lose a heart and the puzzle will reset.
strings.INTERSTITIAL_BODY: CRACK THE CODE TO GAIN TOP SECRET SPY SQUAD ACCESS
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ULTIMATE_SPY_SQUAD_DESCRIPTI: complete all 3 missions with all 3 characters
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_PERFECT_RUN_DESCRIPTION: complete motorcycle mission without ever hitting a robot
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_DOWN_TO_THE_WIRE_DESCRIPTION: complete motorcycle mission with 1 bar of health remaining
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_PLENTY_TO_SPARE_DESCRIPTION: complete motorcycle mission with a full health bar
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_CODE_BREAKER_DESCRIPTION: complete the code breaking minigame for the first time
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_NATURAL_CODE_BREAKER_DESCRIP: complete code breaking minigame without losing any lives
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ELITE_GYMNAST_DESCRIPTION: complete the laser minigame without losing any lives
